doc.title: Huan huan ai
doc.plot: 'Why Why Love' is a story about a girl name Tong Jia Di who only thinks about everyone else but herself. On her 21st birthday, Jia Di's friend made a wish for her that she would find love and to her good fortune she found two. When they go to work at a booth for a big company's reveal, Jai Di's best friend Jiang Xiao Nan places a "Love" coupon in Jia Di's raffle box hoping that Jia Di gets sweep off her feet by the lucky guy who draws it. Hou Yan, manager to the big company, draws the lucky coupon, while his brother Hou Da draws a Master/Angel coupon.
